pageContext.claim: “Now the economy's come back so strong and my poll numbers are good. They're getting very good.”
pageContext.analysis: President Trump’s approval rating sank to just over 41 percent, according to the polling gurus at FiveThirtyEight. That is lower than any modern president with the exception of George H.W. Bush, Jimmy Carter and Harry S. Truman. Of those, only Truman won reelection.
